HomePage.description: This is the search overlay on the Dyson India homepage. The primary purpose is to allow users to search for products and information on the Dyson website.

elements.name: Search Input
elements.description: Input field for entering search queries.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to submit the search query.

elements.name: Close Search Overlay
elements.description: Button to close the search overlay.

elements.name: Dyson Airstrait™ straightener
elements.description: Link to Dyson Airstrait straightener product page.

elements.name: *NEW* Dyson Airwrap i.d.™
elements.description: Link to Dyson Airwrap i.d. product page.

elements.name: Dyson V8 Absolute Vacuum
elements.description: Link to Dyson V8 Absolute Vacuum product page.

elements.name: Dyson Vacuum Cleaners
elements.description: Link to Dyson Vacuum Cleaners product page.

elements.name: Dyson Air Purifiers
elements.description: Link to Dyson Air Purifiers product page.

elements.name: Dyson Deals
elements.description: Link to Dyson Deals product page.

assertions: The text 'Most searched for' is visible

DysonIndiaOfficialWebsitePage.description: This page is the homepage of Dyson India, showcasing their products and promotions.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo in the top left corner, navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to search for products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners category page.

elements.name: Air purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier category page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones category page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting category page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
Page contains the text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI'

ProductsPage.description: This page allows the user to select additional items to bundle with the Dyson V8 Absolute vacuum cleaner. It displays available items and allows the user to add them to their basket.

elements.name: Pet Grooming Kit
elements.description: The Pet Grooming Kit option to add to the bundle.

elements.name: Detail Cleaning Kit
elements.description: The Detail Cleaning Kit option to add to the bundle.

elements.name: Continue to basket (bottom)
elements.description: Button to proceed to the basket with selected items.

elements.name: Continue to basket (top)
elements.description: Button to proceed to the basket with selected items.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Select your items'
The 'Continue to basket' button is present
The price displayed matches the expected price for the base product
